content.question: Which statement best describes Erinaâ€™s early career?

choices.label: She got along well with her coworkers.
She was frustrated with the tasks she was given.
She enjoyed watching others decorate cakes.

content.answer: She was frustrated with the tasks she was given.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
